meanings.definition: To weigh more than something else.
meanings.sent2: The bag of rocks overweighs the bag of feathers.
meanings.sent3: The tiny ant overweighs the huge elephant in a funny race.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness overweighs his stubbornness in their relationship.
meanings.sent5: The guilt overweighs her conscience, making her confess.

meanings.definition: To give more importance or influence to something.
meanings.sent1: In this decision, your opinion overweighs mine.
meanings.sent2: The safety of the children overweighs any other concerns.
meanings.sent3: His love for pizza overweighs his dislike for vegetables, which is amusing.
meanings.sent4: The power of music overweighs the noise of the city, calming her mind.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the sunset overweighs any worries, bringing peace to her heart.
